Capping and scaling back by local authority

{% if scenario == '2' %}

Does the local authority cap and scale back your funding gains to make the funding formula affordable?

Yes

Did the school open in the past 7 years with year groups still missing?

Yes

Your academy is growing. There are no capping and scaling back adjustments to your minimum funding guarantee.

{% else %}

Does the local authority cap and scale back your funding gains to make the funding formula affordable?

No

There is no capping and scaling back adjustment to your minimum funding guarantee.

Total pre-16 high needs £0
Where place numbers come from

Place numbers are either rolled forward from 2020 to 2021 or your local authority agreed it with ESFA. This provides a base level of funding.

You must agree additional funding above this level with your local authority. Local authorities pay you the top-up funding directly. It is not shown in this statement.
